feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.3
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(subflow): remove timeout restriction (#5850) @abuaboud
  • feat: add activation license key through ui (#5789) @hazemadelkhalel

üß© Pieces

  • chore(village-piece): minor content updates: title, description, etc (#5865) @rafaelmuttoni
  • feat(apitable): add auth validation and empty multiselect condition (#5860) @kishanprmr
  • feat(slack): add action to convert markdown text to Slack custom format (#5861) @AdamSelene
  • feat(village-piece): Implement Village's People and Companies paths search (#5809) @rafaelmuttoni
  • fix(date-helper): add custom formats (#5853) @abuaboud
  • feat(human-input): allow chat ui to view images (#5837) @abuaboud
  • feat(file-helper): Add Encoding property to createFile action (#5830) @janwytze
  • feat(pdf): option to concat all images (#5829) @abuaboud

üõ†Ô∏è Piece Framework

  • fix(framework): resolving array of objects (#5832) @abuaboud

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: support redis sentinel (#5866) @abuaboud
  • fix: forbid link & build piece & upgrade nx & close watchers on shutdown (#5855) @abuaboud
  • chore: admin-console typo (#5839) @rafaelmuttoni
  • fix: trigger step not showing its inputs values (#5852) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: resolve re-rendering issue after publishing flow and retrying update (#5846) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: update/create template dialog validation (#5836) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add redis sentinels (#5838) @hazemadelkhalel

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • feat: speed up release pieces ci/cd (#5831) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel, @janwytze, @kishanprmr and @rafaelmuttoni

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.4
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(redis): set max retries to zero (#5869) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@abuaboud

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.5
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(embedded): connections dialog (#5833) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • feat(google-sheets): create worksheet action (#5910) @kishanprmr
  • fix:(text-helper) handle concat texts might be undefined (#5903) @kamal
  • fix(village): fix piece category (#5894) @kishanprmr
  • fix(google-sheets): cast sheet ID to number (#5895) @kishanprmr
  • feat: add basic confluence integration (#5886) @geekyme

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(smtp): validate mail server on platform admin before saving (#5911) @abuaboud
  • fix: webhook support xml body request (#5900) @liuhuapiaoyuan
  • fix: project.externalId uniqueness apply to non-deleted projects only (#5856) @kamal
  • fix: build pieces on initial load (#5889) @kamal
  • fix(sample-data): skip saving undefined (#5873) @abuaboud
  • fix: accept undefined sample data (#5872) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add hardware requirements (#5908) @abuaboud
  • docs: add liuhuapiaoyuan as a contributor for code (#5902) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • fix: validate system props type (#5907) @abuaboud
  • chore: upgrade to 20.18-bullseye-slim (#5906) @abuaboud
  • chore: upgrade to 20.16 bulleye (#5905) @abuaboud
  • feat: upgrade docker image to node 20 (#5904) @abuaboud
  • chore: remove unused turbowatch (#5890) @kamal
  • refactor: remove piece generation cli (#5881) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @geekyme, @kamal, @kishanprmr, @liuhuapiaoyuan and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.6
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add Live Update (Periodic) for Production Run (#5914) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(chat-ui): major improvements (#5893) @anasbarg

üß© Pieces

  • feat(google-sheets): create blank spreadsheet action (#5921) @kishanprmr
  • fix(slack): add groups/im/mpim as scope (#5920) @abuaboud

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(webhook): resolve "too long to reply" issue and incorrect response message in /sync calls (#5922) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: smtp port issue (#5919) @abuaboud
  • fix: custom connections validation wasn't working (#5918) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: truncate long project names in switcher button (#5915) @kamal

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add elestio as installation option (#5912) @kaiwalyakoparkar
  • docs(readme): typo (#5916) @ashrafsamhouri

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @anasbarg, @ashrafsamhouri, @hazemadelkhalel, @kaiwalyakoparkar, @kamal and @kishanprmr
